From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the exceptional hospitality extended by your staff. The entire team demonstrated a level of professionalism and warmth that greatly enhanced my visit. In particular, I would like to commend Adel for his outstanding service. Adelâ€™s dedication and genuine care for guests are truly remarkable, and his attentiveness ensured that every aspect of our meal was perfect.

The food itself was extraordinary. The flavors were rich and authentic, offering a culinary journey that is difficult to find elsewhere. I was especially impressed by the lamb dish; the meat was incredibly tender and juicy, showcasing the high quality and expert preparation that your kitchen delivers consistently.

One of the best spots for authentic Yemeni food! The meat mandi and fish are super flavorful, and the service is top-notch. Big shoutout to Chef Abu Yahya he really knows what heâ€™s doing! ğŸ‘ğŸ”¥

Absolutely amazing experience! Macca Restaurant is the best place to enjoy authentic Yemeni food â€” everything from the flavors to the presentation was perfect. The food was fresh, rich in taste, and full of traditional spices. The service was friendly and attentive, and the atmosphere was warm and welcoming, making it a great spot for families or friends. Highly recommend trying their Mandi and  or Saltah  itâ€™s a must! Iâ€™ll definitely be coming back soon.
